00052                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)

00056                 if (parameters != null)
00057                         this.parameters = (Hashtable<String, String>) parameters.clone();

00059                         this.parameters = new Hashtable<String, String>();

00106         public Hashtable<String, String> getParameters(AbstractEntity entity)
00107         {
00108                 Hashtable<String, String> newparam = new Hashtable<String, String>();
00109                 for (String key : parameters.keySet())
00110                 {
00111                         if (parameters.get(key).startsWith("&"))
00112                                 newparam.put(key, entity.getDataString(key));
00113                         else
00114                                 newparam.put(key, parameters.get(key));
00115                 }
00116                 return newparam;
00117         }
00118 
00122         public void setParameters(Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00123         {
00124                 this.parameters = parameters;
00125         }
00126 
00132         public void addParameters(String field, String value)
00133         {
00134                 parameters.put(field, value);
00135         }
00136 
00140         public String getUrl()
00141         {
00142                 return Servlet.makeLink(action);
00143         }
00144 
00150         public String getParam(AbstractEntity entity)
00151         {
00152                 String param = "";
00153                 for (String key : getParameters(entity).keySet())
00154                 {
00155                         param += key + "=";
00156                         param += parameters.get(key);
00157                         param += "&";
00158                 }
00159                 if (param.length() > 0)
00160                         param = param.substring(0, param.length() - 1);
00161 
00162                 return param;
00163         }
00164 
00170         public String getUrlParam(AbstractEntity entity)
00171         {
00172                 return getUrl() + "?" + getParam(entity);
00173         }
00174

00180         {
00181                 return getUrlParam(null);

00210                         return false;
00211                 if (!(obj instanceof ActionLink))
00212                         return false;

00214                 if (action == null)
00215                 {
00216                         if (other.action != null)
00217                                 return false;
00218                 }
00219                 else if (!action.equals(other.action))
00220                         return false;
00221                 if (confirm != other.confirm)
00222                         return false;
00223                 if (name == null)
00224                 {
00225                         if (other.name != null)
00226                                 return false;
00227                 }
00228                 else if (!name.equals(other.name))
00229                         return false;
00230                 if (parameters == null)
00231                 {

00233                                 return false;
00234                 }
00235                 else if (!parameters.equals(other.parameters))
00236                         return false;
00237                 return true;
